title: B&B Recap: Bill orders Jarrett to squash Sally Spectra’s dreams
text:
B&B Recap: Bill orders Jarrett to squash Sally Spectra’s dreams 
Candace Young Wednesday, February 22nd, 2017 
Wednesday February 22, 2017: Steffy and Thomas speculate about Sally, Jarrett reluctantly attends Spectra’s preview, and Katie pays Bill a visit. Pin 
At Spectra Fashions, Sally wears a leopard print dress and hugs Shirley in anticipation of their preview. Shirley worries they’ll sink or swim based on one man’s review. Sally says all they have to do is impress Jarrett. They go over the plan to show the designs simply in the office since they don’t have the money to fix up the showroom. Sally is certain everyone is going to take notice, including Queen Steffy. As the models get ready, Sally gives her team a pep talk. 
Related: Soap alum Jesse Metcalfe’s Chesapeake Shores renewed on Hallmark Channel 
In Bill’s office, Jarrett resists attending the Spectra preview. Bill restates his mission is to squash Sally Spectra’s dreams. Katie enters as Jarrett’s leaving. Bill explains he’s off to the Spectra Fashions preview. Katie notices that Jarrett seemed out of sorts. Bill muses that he likes the events with caviar and champagne, but he wouldn’t let his mood affect his job. Katie speculates that maybe Jarrett will like the line. Bill is sure he won’t. 
More: B&B’s Obba Babatunde and Anna Maria Horsford in The Choir Director 
At Forrester Creations, Steffy understands Thomas hates her being his boss. She assures him being his sister will always be most important to her. Talk turns to it being a big day for Thomas’ favorite redhead. Steffy’s sure it will be a hot mess. They debate about whether Sally will achieve any success. Thomas argues that Sally’s dedicated, and Steffy muses that’s no good if there’s no talent to back it up. Thomas thinks the talent will come to her. Steffy laughs at the idea that Sally could become competition, and argues the point that Sally is just like her aunt given the stunts she’s pulled. 
Related: OLTL alum David Gregory’s Happy Anniversary project 
Jarrett arrives at Spectra Fashions, where Sally fawns over him – her aunt said he was the best of the best. Jarrett is surprised given their history. Sally introduces him to her team and says the exclusive preview will be held in the office so as to be ‘up close and personal’. When the models are ready, Sally has Darlita cue the music and the show begins with a bold red gown followed by two other quirky designs and a bright yellow showstopper. Jarrett pronounces the designs unique in a good way. Sally hopes to see that opinion reflected in his review. Jarrett sighs deeply as she tells him they need a push from someone as esteemed as he is in the industry. Jarrett downplays his influence and exits hastily. Sally looks perturbed, but delivers another pep talk. Thomas calls and she tells him the preview went fabulous – she’ll be making headlines tomorrow. 
In Bill’s office, Jarrett reveals that the preview wasn’t that terrible – much to his surprise, Sally’s designs were interesting. Bill won’t have him writing a fair, honest review – it must be scathing and career-ending. “We are putting Spectra out of business.”
